entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 06:06 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NNE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Canada Bay area in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
